repnme.cdata!:
Central African Republic - Third Structural
            Adjustment Program

abstracts.cdata!:
The credit supports the third phase of
            the Government's adjustment program for addressing key
            macroeconomic and sectoral issues over the medium term. The
            program components are: (a) further improvement of
            macroeconomic management, with emphasis on monetary policy,
            reduction of the structural budget deficit, and on
            investment planning and programming; (b) civil service
            reform to improve the efficiency and performance of
            government services; (c) reform of the enterprise and
            financial sectors, including consolidation of parastatal
            sector reform, reform of the financial sector, and
            enhancement of an incentive environment for private sector
            expansion; (d) reform of agricultural institutions and
            policies, including promotion of export diversification; and
            (e) measures to address the social dimensions of adjustment.
